job_tasks.phrase: het integreren van beeld- en taalmodellen in bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the act of incorporating AI models (image and language models) into existing business processes, which is a core aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met data engineers, data scientists en cloudspecialisten bouw je aan oplossingen die niet in de la belanden, maar daadwerkelijk draaien in productieomgevingen.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence emphasizes building solutions that are deployed and run in production environments, a key software engineering task related to deployment and operationalization.

job_tasks.phrase: je weet hoe je AI inricht als onderdeel van een schaalbare data-architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing AI as part of a scalable data architecture falls under the umbrella of software architecture and integration, ensuring systems are robust and scalable.

job_tasks.phrase: het automatiseren van besluitvorming met machine learning
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to using machine learning for automating decision-making, which is a core task in model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: het ontwikkelen van generatieve AI-oplossingen met LLM's
job_tasks.justification: Developing generative AI solutions specifically with LLMs is a direct indicator of tasks related to prompt engineering and the application of generative models.

soft_skills.phrase: Je schakelt moeiteloos tussen techniek en toepassing.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates the ability to bridge technical concepts with practical application, implying effective communication and understanding across different domains.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met data engineers, data scientists en cloudspecialisten bouw je aan oplossingen
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions working together with other specialists, highlighting collaboration as a key aspect of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt aan innovatieve oplossingen met een bewezen waarde voor onze klanten.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase emphasizes creating solutions with proven value for clients, indicating a need to understand business needs and align technical work with business outcomes.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a balanced mix of tasks. It explicitly mentions developing generative AI solutions with LLMs (1.B.2) and integrating AI models into business processes (1.A.1), as well as building solutions for production (1.A.1). The technologies mentioned (OpenAI, LLMs) are specific to Generative AI. While there's a mention of automating decision-making with ML (1.B.1), the emphasis on generative AI and LLMs, combined with the software engineering aspects of integration and production deployment, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear and specific about the types of AI tasks (generative AI, LLMs) and the software engineering aspects (integration, production deployment). The technologies mentioned are also directly relevant to GenAI. This clarity allows for a high-confidence classification.
